title: Flux talisman
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| - | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A canister holding an ominously glowing substance. Its user becomes unstable at a fundamental level, inflicting dangerous levels of magical contamination on foes with each touch. Sufficient contamination causes a highly localized meltdown, dealing enormous damage which increases with the user's Shapeshifting skill.However, this instability makes the user unable to use weapons, shields or body armour. They also glow, reducing stealth and preventing invisibility, and their melee damage is reduced, as their limbs sometimes destabilize mid-swing. |

[![Flux talisman.png](/images/e/ef/Flux_talisman.png)](/File:Flux_talisman.png) A **flux talisman** is a [talisman](/Talisman "Talisman") that changes you into **Flux Form**.

[Shapeshifters](/Shapeshifter "Shapeshifter") start with this item.

## Useful Info

When e**V**oked, a flux talisman turns you into Flux Form, which lasts until you end the form. Entering or exiting a form takes 5 turns.

Flux Form has the following effects:

**Combat Bonuses**

- **[Unarmed Combat](/Unarmed_Combat "Unarmed Combat"):** 3 base damage (*no boost*).
- **Contaminating attacks:** When you hit an enemy, you contaminate them. The first hit inflicts [Corona](/Corona "Corona"). The third hit inflicts [malmutate](/Malmutate "Malmutate"), deals heavy damage, and resets contamination. This deals (0 to 10) damage at 0 skill, (0 to 30) damage at 7 skill, (0 to 50) damage at 14 or more skill, with linear scaling in-between.
- **Bonus EV:** +4 EV.
- All melee damage is reduced by -33%.

**Restrictions**

- **[Melded Gear](/Transformation#Useful_Info "Transformation"):** [Weapon](/Weapon "Weapon"), [shield](/Shield "Shield"), [body armour](/Body_armour "Body armour").
- You cannot [throw](/Throw "Throw") items.
- **Glowing:** You are revealed if [invisible](/Invisible "Invisible"), and your [stealth](/Stealth "Stealth") is greatly reduced.

Flux Form does not block any [mutations](/Mutation "Mutation"), does not change your [size](/Size "Size"), and gives no innate bonus to HP / [AC](/AC "AC").

Flux Form has a minimum of 7 [Shapeshifting](/Shapeshifting "Shapeshifting") skill, below which you get an [HP penalty](/Talisman#Skill "Talisman"), and the contamination effect scales down. It has a maximum skill of 14; further skill has no further impact.

## Strategy

A form that's between [Beast Form](/Beast_Form "Beast Form") and the stronger forms. At the min. skill of 7, the contam proc is better than having [electrocution](/Electrocution "Electrocution"). While your actual melee damage is reduced, your overall damage output is still good, and the Corona / malmutate status are very nice to have.

## History

- Flux talismans were introduced in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), along with talismans themselves.

|                                   | [Transformations](/Transformation "Transformation")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Talisman](/Talisman "Talisman")  | [Beast Form](/Beast_Form "Beast Form") • [Flux Form](/Flux_Form "Flux Form") • [Blade Form](/Blade_Form "Blade Form") • [Maw Form](/Maw_Form "Maw Form") • [Serpent Form](/Serpent_Form "Serpent Form") • [Dragon Form](/Dragon_Form "Dragon Form") • [Statue Form](/Statue_Form "Statue Form") • [Death Form](/Death_Form "Death Form") • [Storm Form](/Storm_Form "Storm Form") |
| [Bad Forms](/Bad_Form "Bad Form") | [Bat Form](/Bat_Form "Bat Form") • [Fungus Form](/Fungus_Form "Fungus Form") • [Pig Form](/Pig_Form "Pig Form") • [Tree Form](/Tree_Form "Tree Form") • [Wisp Form](/Wisp_Form "Wisp Form")                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Divine](/God "God")              | [Shadow Form](/Shadow_Form "Shadow Form")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
html:
Flux talisman

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
A canister holding an ominously glowing substance. Its user becomes unstable at a fundamental level, inflicting dangerous levels of magical contamination on foes with each touch. Sufficient contamination causes a highly localized meltdown, dealing enormous damage which increases with the user's Shapeshifting skill.

However, this instability makes the user unable to use weapons, shields or body armour. They also glow, reducing stealth and preventing invisibility, and their melee damage is reduced, as their limbs sometimes destabilize mid-swing.

A flux talisman is a talisman that changes you into Flux Form.

Shapeshifters start with this item.

Useful Info

When eVoked, a flux talisman turns you into Flux Form, which lasts until you end the form. Entering or exiting a form takes 5 turns.

Flux Form has the following effects:

Combat Bonuses

  • Unarmed Combat: 3 base damage (no boost).
  • Contaminating attacks: When you hit an enemy, you contaminate them. The first hit inflicts Corona. The third hit inflicts malmutate, deals heavy damage, and resets contamination. This deals (0 to 10) damage at 0 skill, (0 to 30) damage at 7 skill, (0 to 50) damage at 14 or more skill, with linear scaling in-between.
  • Bonus EV: +4 EV.
  • All melee damage is reduced by -33%.

Restrictions

  • Melded Gear: Weapon, shield, body armour.
  • You cannot throw items.
  • Glowing: You are revealed if invisible, and your stealth is greatly reduced.

Flux Form does not block any mutations, does not change your size, and gives no innate bonus to HP / AC.

Flux Form has a minimum of 7 Shapeshifting skill, below which you get an HP penalty, and the contamination effect scales down. It has a maximum skill of 14; further skill has no further impact.

Strategy

A form that's between Beast Form and the stronger forms. At the min. skill of 7, the contam proc is better than having electrocution. While your actual melee damage is reduced, your overall damage output is still good, and the Corona / malmutate status are very nice to have.

History

  • Flux talismans were introduced in 0.31, along with talismans themselves.
Transformations
Talisman Beast Form • Flux Form • Blade Form • Maw Form • Serpent Form • Dragon Form • Statue Form • Death Form • Storm Form
Bad Forms Bat Form • Fungus Form • Pig Form • Tree Form • Wisp Form
Divine Shadow Form

[[File:flux talisman.png]] A '''flux talisman''' is a [[talisman]] that changes you into '''Flux Form'''.

[[Shapeshifter]]s start with this item.

==Useful Info==
When e'''V'''oked, a flux talisman turns you into Flux Form, which lasts until you end the form. Entering or exiting a form takes 5 turns.

Flux Form has the following effects:

'''Combat Bonuses'''
*'''[[Unarmed Combat]]:''' 3 base damage (''no boost'').

Flux Form does not block any [[mutation]]s, does not change your [[size]], and gives no innate bonus to HP / [[AC]].

Flux Form has a minimum of 7 [[Shapeshifting]] skill, below which you get an [[Talisman#Skill|HP penalty]], and the contamination effect scales down. It has a maximum skill of 14; further skill has no further impact.

==Strategy==
A form that's between [[Beast Form]] and the stronger forms. At the min. skill of 7, the contam proc is better than having [[electrocution]]. While your actual melee damage is reduced, your overall damage output is still good, and the Corona / malmutate status are very nice to have.

==History==
